Row.Text: Greetings comrade. I am Kim il-Sung, president of the Korean people. I am a firm believer in men's control over his destiny. I wonder if ours will cross...
The Korean people's revolution must go on without me...
Salutations comrade. Encouraging revolution I hope?
Imperialists are not welcome in Korea. Speak quickly.
Your illegal occupation will finally cease! Korea will recover these lands that were unjustly stolen!
World revolution is the destiny of humanity. You fail to encourage it, therefore we will enforce it!
Ha! What a misguided fool you are to not appreciate what I'm doing here for the Korean people. Perhaps we'll have to spread our revolution to your lands...

You engage in idiotic imperial ambitions rather than promoting the revolution of your downtrodden people. We will end your oppressive rule by any means necessary.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
For the revolution to occur, the people need a Great Leader. I believe you have potential as one. Will you join my revolutionary efforts?
The Korean people will not surrender until the revolution succeeds!
